section.title: Creating Drools Commands
section.para: The next step is create our commands to be converted to XML. All our commands must be added in a BatchExecutionCommand object because the lookup is a required parameter in the XML format. The lookup parameter must be the KnowledgeSession identifier in which we want to execute the commands.
